Original:
今天第一次到G Club打鏢，店員很友善的介紹我消費的選項，有200元暢打2小時的方案，以及有不同機台可供選擇，類似D2或鳳凰。

我覺得今天去這裡算是賺到了，不僅找到一個寬敞舒適的空間，而且還可以和飛鏢同好進行交流學習。

Today, I went to G Club for the first time. The clerk introduced the options for my consumption very friendly. There are schemes of 200 yuan for 2 hours, and there are different machines to choose from, similar to D2 or Phoenix.
In the process of practicing darts, the boss came to ask about the configuration of my darts. I told him that I didn't know much. They all explored myself. He inspected my darts and gave me some guidance and suggestions. I have improved my concept and technology. In the end, the boss also gave me a set of dart rods. After matching this group of dart rods, the control became better.
I think it ’s a profit to go here today. Not only did I find a spacious and comfortable space, but I can also communicate and learn with darts.
